title: When to ult as Cass when Garen spins or Kat ults

replies.body: They are facing the exact direction they would if they werent spinning.
So the spin is only a visual effect?

Correct. For all intents and purposes, as far as stuff like Cassiopeia's ult is concerned, Garen and Katarina (And Wukong)'s models arent actually spinning.


Garen, Wukong and Tryndamere (His dash is a spin) are ''looking'' at the direction they are currently moving torwards. Katarina is facing the same direction she was before ulting.
Katarina bursts so fast its hard to see...

when they do it, towards them. 60% of the time, it works every time.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Garen and Lucian work with the direction they're moving in. For example, if Garen was spinning and moving towards you he's facing you, and if Lucian was shooting one way with his ult but backpedaling he'd be facing the direction he's moving.
For Katarina it's likely the way she was facing before she ulted.
am guessing where he was looking at before he started spinning if he hasn't moves. if he moved then hes looking at the direction he moved to.

I believe they are facing the same way that they would be if they were not spinning, could be wrong. 

Like if garen is moving then thats where he is facing. For kat she is facing where she was when she started.
